Articles.Content: Are there any videos or tutorials on building refueling stations in space or on the Mun for career mode? Thanks!
It is up to you to decide how you want to do things. It depends, but if you are rendezvousing from the surface, a low orbit station is ideal.
Scott Manley started one, also there's the Space Station Thread for more inspiration, most of them use mods but there are a few stock ones in there.

I've got one orbiting Minmus. My advice is just go with what you think will work best in terms of altitude. Also Minmus is where I docked my first two crafts together because of the low speeds in space.
